name: The Uncontrollable
description:
You are uncontrollable... So get out of control! 

You are in unknown laboratory, where wicked scientists experimented with you... but suddenly you wake up and realize - you need to get out of their control!

This game is a small adventure with some shooter elements and interesting mechanics: main hero is such a capricious person that gets tired quickly, fears of pain and, of course, lava! So try to cope with his manners and help him get out of control!
